pl.myrecipebasket.web.controller

Class CommentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.myrecipebasket.web.controller.CommentController

  • @Controller
public class CommentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Object CommentController is responsible for displaying comment.html page when requested by User, receiving Comment related data provided by User via comment.html form and persist this data in MyRecipeBasket database using appropriate services.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String uploadDirectory
      uploadDirectory field declaration which is a path where all uploaded Images are saved
